statements: DELETE FROM fraudulent_activities WHERE detected_fraud = TRUE;
DELETE FROM fraudulent_activities WHERE detected_fraud = TRUE;
DELETE FROM fraudulent_activities WHERE user_id = 123 AND activity_type = 'login';
DELETE FROM DetectedFraud WHERE detection_result = TRUE AND activity_id IN (SELECT activity_id FROM FraudulentActivities WHERE user_id = 'xyz456');
DELETE FROM FraudulentActivities WHERE activity_id IN (SELECT activity_id FROM DetectedFraud WHERE detection_result = TRUE);
DELETE FROM FraudulentActivities WHERE activity_id = 10 AND user_id = 100
DELETE FROM SuspiciousTransactions WHERE transaction_id = 20 AND user_id = 200
DELETE FROM SuspiciousTransactions WHERE transaction_id IN (SELECT transaction_id FROM TransactionHistory WHERE transaction_status = 'Flagged');
DELETE FROM UserWatchlist WHERE user_id = (SELECT user_id FROM SuspiciousTransactions WHERE transaction_amount > 10000);
